answers.answer: It seems to me that doctors all do things differently. I've seen mine every 4 or 5 weeks with an ultrasound each time. But I have 2 friends who are also pregnant and it was more like every 6 or 7 for them. But you should be having your anatomy scan soon and should be able to find out gender for sure! When is your next appt?

All my Dr does is weigh me, blood pressure,check my pee for protein,and listen to the baby's heart beat.Did you have all your first trimester screens and blood work done thay u wanted to get? If so I don't think you missed anything important. I only had one scan to determine the position of the baby  and at 20 weeks I'll have the anotomy scan. You do need to start going through. Soon will be the sugar tolerance test to rule out gestational diabetes.
I go once a month to my ob appts

I found out my gender 6 weeks ago, im having a boy. Finished all my blood work & everything was left at fine. Im seeing a new og today. Hopfully all goes well, sitting here waiting to go in & see her.

I found out my gender 6 weeks ago, im having a boy. Finished all my blood work & everything was left at fine. Im seeing a new og today. Hopfully all goes well, sitting here waiting to go in & see her.

I go to the doctor every 4 weeks. After my next appointment it'll be every 2 weeks until I'm like 35 then every week.  That's how most doctors are, I thought.  That's how anyone around here is. I've had blood drawn 3 times before my appointment at 18 weeks. We already know we are having a boy, but my anatomy scan is at 21 weeks and I'm so excited to see how much he has changed! I couldn't imagine waiting any longer than 4 weeks to go.. it seems like it takes too long anyway

question: Did i miss something extremely important?????? Im 20 weeks today, havent went to the doctor since i was 14 weeks.
title: Haven't gone to the doctor for 6 weeks, I'm 20 weeks today!
